pkgmetadata.longdescription: Shed Light on Black Box Machine Learning Models // Shed light on black box machine learning models by the help of model performance, permutation variable importance (Fisher et al. (2018) arxiv.org/abs/1801.01489), ICE profiles, partial dependence (Friedman J. H. (2001) doi.org/10.1214/aos/1013203451), and further effects plots. All tools are implemented to work with case weights and allow for stratified analysis. Furthermore, multiple flashlights can be combined and analyzed together.
